arabicText: الٓمٓر ۚ تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ۗ وَٱلَّذِىٓ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Alif-Lam-Meem-Ra*;	 these	 are	 verses	 of	
the	 Book;	 and	 that	 which	 has	 been	 sent	
down	upon	you	from	your	Lord	is	true,	but	
most	men	do	not	believe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Alif-Lam-Meem-Ra*;	Yeh	 kitāb	 ki	āayateñ	
haiñ	 aur	 woh	 jo	 tumhāri	 țaraf	 tumhāre	
Rab	 ke	 pās	 se	 utrā	Haq	 hai	 magar	 aksar	
āadmi	Imān nahiñ	lāte

arabicText: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى رَفَعَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ بِغَيْرِ عَمَدٍۢ تَرَوْنَهَا ۖ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ۖ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّۭ يَجْرِى لِأَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّۭى ۚ يُدَبِّرُ ٱلْأَمْرَ يُفَصِّلُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لَعَلَّكُم بِلِقَآءِ رَبِّكُمْ تُوقِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
It	 is	 Allah Who	 raised	 up	 the	 heavens	
without	columns	 for	you	to	observe,	then	
(befitting	His	Majesty)	established	Himself	
upon	 the	 Throne	 (of	 control),	 then	
subjected	the	sun	and	the	moon;	each	one	
runs	 for	 up	 to	 an	 appointed	 term;	 Allah
plans	 the	 works	 and	 explain	the	 signs	 in	
detail,	so	that	you	may	believe	in	meeting	
with	your	Lord.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allāh	hai	jis	ne	āsmānoñ ko	buland	kiyā	be	
sutoonoñ	 ke	 ke	 tum	 dekho	 phir ársh	 par	
istiwā	farmāyā	jaisā Us	ki	Shān	ke	lāiq	hai	
aur	sooraj	aur	chāñd	ko	musakhkhar	kiyā	
har	ek- ek	thahrāye	huye	wáde	tak	chaltā	
hai Allāh	 kām	 ki	 tadbeer	 farmātā	 hai	 aur	
mufassal	nishaniyañ	batātā	hai	kahiñ	tum	
apne	Rab	kā	milnā	yaqin	karo

arabicText: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى مَدَّ ٱلْأَرْضَ وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنْهَـٰرًۭا ۖ وَمِن كُلِّ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ جَعَلَ فِيهَا زَوْجَيْنِ ٱثْنَيْنِ ۖ يُغْشِى ٱلَّيْلَ ٱلنَّهَارَ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍۢ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	it	is	He	Who	spread	out	the	earth	and	
made	mountains	as	anchors	and	rivers	in	
it;	and	in	it	made	all	kinds	of	fruits	in	pairs	
- He	covers	the	night	with	the	day;	indeed	
in	this	are	signs	for	people	who	ponder.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	wohi	 	 hai	jis	 ne	 zameen	 ko	 phailāyā	
aur	is	meiñ	langar	aur	nahreñ	banāyiñ	aur	
zameen			meiñ	har	qism	ke	phal	do	do	țarah	
ke	banāye	rāt	se	din	ko	chupā	letā	hai	beshak		is	meiñ	nishaniyañ	haiñ	dhiyān	karne	wāloñ	ko

arabicText: وَفِى ٱلْأَرْضِ قِطَعٌۭ مُّتَجَـٰوِرَٰتٌۭ وَجَنَّـٰتٌۭ مِّنْ أَعْنَـٰبٍۢ وَزَرْعٌۭ وَنَخِيلٌۭ صِنْوَانٌۭ وَغَيْرُ صِنْوَانٍۢ يُسْقَىٰ بِمَآءٍۢ وَٰحِدٍۢ وَنُفَضِّلُ بَعْضَهَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ فِى ٱلْأُكُلِ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍۢ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	in	 the	earth	are	various	regions,	and	
are	 close	 to	 each	 other	- and	 gardens	 of	
grapes	and	fields,	and	date-palms,	growing	from	a	single	branch	and	separately,	all	being	given	
one	water;	and	in	fruits,	We	make	some	better than	others	in	eating;	indeed	in	this	are	signs	for	
people	of	intellect.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	zameen	ke	mukhtalif	qiț’ae	(tukde)	haiñ	aur	haiñ	pās	pās	aur	bagh	haiñ	angooroñ	ke	aur	
kheti	aur	khajoor	ke	ped	ek	thāle	(gadhe)	se	uge	aur	alag	alag	sab	ko	ek	hi	pāni	diyā	jātā	hai	aur	
phaloñ	meiñ	 ham	 ek	 doosre	 ko	 doosre	 se	 behtar	 karte	 haiñ	 be-shak	is	meiñ	 nishaniyañ	 haiñ
áqlmandoñ	ke	liye

arabicText: ۞ وَإِن تَعْجَبْ فَعَجَبٌۭ قَوْلُهُمْ أَءِذَا كُنَّا تُرَٰبًا أَءِنَّا لَفِى خَلْقٍۢ جَدِيدٍ ۗ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِرَبِّهِمْ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلْأَغْلَـٰلُ فِىٓ أَعْنَاقِهِمْ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	you	are	amazed,	then	indeed	the	amazement	is	at	their	saying	that,	“Will	we,	after	having	
turned	to	dust,	be	created	anew?”	They	are	those	who	have	disbelieved	in	their	Lord; and	they	
are	those	who	will	have	shackles	around	their	necks;	and	they	are	the	people	of	hell;	remaining	
in	it	forever.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	tum	t’ājjub	karo	to	achanbhā	(t’ājjub)	to	un	ke	is	kahne	kā	hai	ke	kyā	ham	mitti	ho	kar	
phir	naye	baneñ	ge	woh	haiñ	jo	apne	rab	se	munkir	huye	aur	woh	haiñ	jin	ki	gardanoñ	meiñ	țauq	
hoñ	ge	aur	woh	dozakh	wāle	haiñ	unheiñ	usi	meiñ	rahnā

arabicText: وَيَسْتَعْجِلُونَكَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبْلَ ٱلْحَسَنَةِ وَقَدْ خَلَتْ مِن قَبْلِهِمُ ٱلْمَثُلَـٰتُ ۗ وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو مَغْفِرَةٍۢ لِّلنَّاسِ عَلَىٰ ظُلْمِهِمْ ۖ وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَشَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
englishTranslationText:
And	 they	 urge	 you	 to	 hasten	 the	
punishment	before	the	mercy,	whereas	the	
punishments	 of	 those	 before	 them	 have	
concluded;	and	indeed	your	Lord	gives	the	
people	 a	 sort	 of	 pardon	 *	 despite	 their	
injustice;	 and	 indeed	 the	 punishment	 of	
your	 Lord	 is	 severe.	 (*	 By	 delaying	 their	
punishment	despite	their	disbelief.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	tum	se áƶāb	ki	jaldi	karte	haiñ	Rahmat		
se	 pahle aur	 un	 se	 agloñ	 ki	 sazāyeñ	 ho	
chukiñ	aur	be-shak	tumhārā	Rab	to	logoñ	
ke	zulm	par	bhi	unheiñ	ek	țarah	ki	mu’āfi	
detā	hai	aur	be-shak	tumhāre	Rab	kā áƶāb	
sakht	hai

arabicText: وَيَسْتَعْجِلُونَكَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبْلَ ٱلْحَسَنَةِ وَقَدْ خَلَتْ مِن قَبْلِهِمُ ٱلْمَثُلَـٰتُ ۗ وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو مَغْفِرَةٍۢ لِّلنَّاسِ عَلَىٰ ظُلْمِهِمْ ۖ وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَشَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
englishTranslationText:
The	 disbelievers	 say,	 “Why	 is	 not	 a	 sign	
sent	down	upon	him	 from	his	Lord?”	You	
are	 purely	 a	 Herald	 of	 Warning,	 and	 a	
guide	for	all	nations.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kāfir	kahte	haiñ	in	par	in	ke	rab	ki	țaraf	
se	koi	nishāni	kiyuñ	nahiñ	utri?	Tum	to	dar	
sunāne	wāle	ho	aur	har	qaum	ke	hādi

arabicText: ٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا تَحْمِلُ كُلُّ أُنثَىٰ وَمَا تَغِيضُ ٱلْأَرْحَامُ وَمَا تَزْدَادُ ۖ وَكُلُّ شَىْءٍ عِندَهُۥ بِمِقْدَارٍ
englishTranslationText:
Allah knows	all	what	is	inside	the	womb	of	
every	 female,	 and	 every	 increase	 and	
decrease	of	the	wombs;	and	all	things	are	
with	Him	by	a	set	measure.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allāh	jāntā	hai	jo	kuchh		kisi	mādah	ke	pet	
meiñ	 hai	 aur	 pet	 jo	 kuchh	 ghat-te	 aur	
badhte	 haiñ	 aur	 har	 chiz	 us	 ke	 pās	 ek	
andāze	se	hai	aur

arabicText: عَـٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ ٱلْكَبِيرُ ٱلْمُتَعَالِ
englishTranslationText:
The All	Knowing	 of	all	 things	hidden	and	
visible,	the	Great,	the	Supreme.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Har	chupe	aur	khule	kā	janne	wālā	sab	se	
badā	bulandi	wālā

arabicText: سَوَآءٌۭ مِّنكُم مَّنْ أَسَرَّ ٱلْقَوْلَ وَمَن جَهَرَ بِهِۦ وَمَنْ هُوَ مُسْتَخْفٍۭ بِٱلَّيْلِ وَسَارِبٌۢ بِٱلنَّهَارِ
englishTranslationText:
Equal	*	are	the	one	among	you	who	speaks	
softly	and	one	who	speaks	aloud,	and	one	
who	 is	 hidden	 during	 the	 night	 and	 one	
who	 walks	 during	 the	 daytime.	 (*	 For	
Allah.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Barābar	haiñ	jo	tum	meiñ	bāt	āahista	kahe	
aur	jo	āawāz	se	aur	jo	rāt	meiñ	chupā	hai	aur	jo	din	meiñ	rāh	chaltā	hai

arabicText: لَهُۥ مُعَقِّبَـٰتٌۭ مِّنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِۦ يَحْفَظُونَهُۥ مِنْ أَمْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُغَيِّرُ مَا بِقَوْمٍ حَتَّىٰ يُغَيِّرُوا۟ مَا بِأَنفُسِهِمْ ۗ وَإِذَآ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِقَوْمٍۢ سُوٓءًۭا فَلَا مَرَدَّ لَهُۥ ۚ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ مِن وَالٍ
englishTranslationText:
For	man	are	angels	of	alternating	duties,	in	
front	and	 behind	 him,	who	guard	 him	 by	
Allah’s	command;	indeed	Allah does	not	change	His	 favour	upon	any	nation	until	 they	change	
their	own	condition;	and	when	Allah wills	misfortune	for	a	nation,	it	cannot	be	repelled;	and	they	
do	not	have	any	supporter	besides	Him.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Āadmi	ke	liye	badli	wāle	 firishte	haiñ	us	ke	āage	aur	pichhe	ke	ba	hukm-e-khudā	us	ki	hifāzat	
karte	haiñ	be-shak		Allāh	kisi	qaum	se	apni	ne’amat	nahiñ	badaltā	jab	tak	woh	khud	apni	hālat	na	
badal	deñ	aur	jab	Allāh	kisi	qaum	se	burāyi	chāhe	to	woh	phir	nahiñ	sakti	aur	us	ke	siwā	un	kā	
koi	himāyati	nahiñ

arabicText: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُرِيكُمُ ٱلْبَرْقَ خَوْفًۭا وَطَمَعًۭا وَيُنشِئُ ٱلسَّحَابَ ٱلثِّقَالَ
englishTranslationText: It	is	He	Who	shows	you	the	lightning,	for	fear	and	for	hope,	and	raises	the	heavy	clouds.
romanUrduTranslationText: Wohi		hai	jo	tumheñ	bijli	dikhātā	hai	dar	ko	aur	ummid	ko	aur	bhāri	badliyāñ	uthātā	hai.

arabicText: وَيُسَبِّحُ ٱلرَّعْدُ بِحَمْدِهِۦ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ مِنْ خِيفَتِهِۦ وَيُرْسِلُ ٱلصَّوَٰعِقَ فَيُصِيبُ بِهَا مَن يَشَآءُ وَهُمْ يُجَـٰدِلُونَ فِى ٱللَّهِ وَهُوَ شَدِيدُ ٱلْمِحَالِ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	thunder	proclaims	His	purity	with	praise,	and	the	angels	out	of	fear	of	Him;	and	He	sends	
the	 bolt	 of	 lightning	 - it	 therefore	 strikes	 upon	 whom	 He	 wills,	 whilst	 they	 are	 disputing	
concerning	Allah;	and	severe	is	His	seizure.
romanUrduTranslationText:
And	the	thunder	proclaims	His	purity	with	praise,	and	the	angels	out	of	fear	of	Him;	and	He	sends	
the	 bolt	 of	 lightning	 - it	 therefore	 strikes	 upon	 whom	 He	 wills,	 whilst	 they	 are	 disputing	
concerning	Allah;	and	severe	is	His	seizure.

arabicText: لَهُۥ دَعْوَةُ ٱلْحَقِّ ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ لَا يَسْتَجِيبُونَ لَهُم بِشَىْءٍ إِلَّا كَبَـٰسِطِ كَفَّيْهِ إِلَى ٱلْمَآءِ لِيَبْلُغَ فَاهُ وَمَا هُوَ بِبَـٰلِغِهِۦ ۚ وَمَا دُعَآءُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
Only	 the	 prayer	 to	 Him	 is	 truthful;	 and	
whomever	 they	 pray	 to	 besides	 Him,	 do	
not	hear	them	at	all,	but	like	one	who	has	
his	hands	outstretched	towards	water	that	
it	 may	 come	 into	 his	 mouth,	 and	 it	 will	
never	 come; and	 every	 prayer	 of	 the	
disbelievers	remains	wandering.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Usi	kā	pukārnā	sachchā	hai	aur	us	ke	siwā	
jin	 ko	 pukārte	 haiñ	 woh	 un	 ki	 kuchh	 bhi	
nahiñ	 sunte	magar	 us	 ki	 țarah	jo	 pāni	 ke	
sāmne	apni	hatheliyāñ	phailāye	baithā	hai	
ke	us	ke	muñh	meiñ	pahuñch	jāye	aur	woh	
hargiz	na	 pahuñche	gā	aur	 kāfiroñ	 ki har	
du’ā	bhatakti	phirti	hai

arabicText: لَوَلِلَّهِ يَسْجُدُ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ طَوْعًۭا وَكَرْهًۭا وَظِلَـٰلُهُم بِٱلْغُدُوِّ وَٱلْـَٔاصَالِ ۩
englishTranslationText:
And	to	Allah only	prostrate	all	those	who	
are	 in	 the	 heavens	 and	 in	 the	 earth,	
willingly	or	helplessly	- and	their	shadows	
- every	morning	and	evening.	(Command 
of Prostration # 2)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Allāh	 hi	 ko	 Sajdā karte	 haiñ	 jitne	
āasmānoñ		aur	zameen			meiñ	haiñ	khushi	
se	 khuwah	 majboori	 se	 aur	 un	 ki	
parchāiyāñ	har	subh-o-sham
(Sajde	ka	hukm	#2)

arabicText: قُلْ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ ۚ قُلْ أَفَٱتَّخَذْتُم مِّن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ لِأَنفُسِهِمْ نَفْعًۭا وَلَا ضَرًّۭا ۚ قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِى ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ وَٱلْبَصِيرُ أَمْ هَلْ تَسْتَوِى ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتُ وَٱلنُّورُ ۗ أَمْ جَعَلُوا۟ لِلَّهِ شُرَكَآءَ خَلَقُوا۟ كَخَلْقِهِۦ فَتَشَـٰبَهَ ٱلْخَلْقُ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ خَـٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ وَهُوَ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّـٰرُ
englishTranslationText:
Say	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	
and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him),	 “Who	 is	 the	
Lord	 of	 the	 heavens	 and	 the	 earth?”	
Proclaim,	 “Allah”;	 Say,	 “So	 have	 you	
appointed	such	as	supporters	besides	Him,	
who	 can	 neither	 benefit	 nor	 harm	
themselves?”;	say,	“Will	 the	blind	and	 the	
sighted	ever	be	equal?	Or	will	the	realms	of	
darkness	 and	 the	 light	 ever	 be	 equal?”	
Have	 they	 appointed	 such	 as	 partners	 to	
Allah who	 created	 something	 like	 Allah
did?	 Therefore	 their	 creation	 and	 His	
creation	seemed	alike	 to	 them?	Proclaim,	
“Allah is	 the	Creator	 of	all	 things,	and	He	
Alone	is	the	Dominant	over	all.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	kaun	Rab	hai	āasmānoñ		aur	
zameen	kā	?	tum	khud	hi	farmāo Allāh	tum	
farmāo	 to	 kyā	 us	 ke	 siwā	 tum	 ne	 woh	
himāyati	banā	liye	haiñ	jo	apnā	bhalā	burā	
nahiñ	 kar	 sakte	 haiñ	 tum	 farmāo kyā	
barābar	ho	jāyeñ	ge	andhā	aur	ankhyārā	yā	
kyā	 barābar	 ho	 jāyeñ	 gi	 andheriyāñ	 aur	
ujālā	Kyā	Allāh	ke	liye	aise	sharik	thahrāye	
haiñ jinhoñ	ne	Allāh	ki	țarah	kuchh		banāyā	
to	 unheñ	 un	 kā	 aur	 us	 kā	 banānā	 ek	 sā	
m’aloom	huā	tum	farmāo	Allāh	har	chiz	kā	
banāne	 wālā	 hai	 aur	 woh	 akelā	 sab	 par	
ghālib	hai

arabicText: أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ فَسَالَتْ أَوْدِيَةٌۢ بِقَدَرِهَا فَٱحْتَمَلَ ٱلسَّيْلُ زَبَدًۭا رَّابِيًۭا ۚ وَمِمَّا يُوقِدُونَ عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلنَّارِ ٱبْتِغَآءَ حِلْيَةٍ أَوْ مَتَـٰعٍۢ زَبَدٌۭ مِّثْلُهُۥ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يَضْرِبُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْحَقَّ وَٱلْبَـٰطِلَ ۚ فَأَمَّا ٱلزَّبَدُ فَيَذْهَبُ جُفَآءًۭ ۖ وَأَمَّا مَا يَنفَعُ ٱلنَّاسَ فَيَمْكُثُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يَضْرِبُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْأَمْثَالَ
englishTranslationText:
He	 sent	 down	 water	 from	 the	 sky,	 so	
valleys	flowed	according	to	their	measure,	
therefore	the	water	flow	brought	forth	the	
froth	swollen	upon	it;	and	upon	which	they	
ignite	the	fire,	to	make	ornaments	and	tools,	from	that	too	rises	a	similar	froth;	Allah illustrates
that	this	is	the	example	of	the	truth	and	the	falsehood;	the	froth	then	bursts	and	disappears;	and	
that	which	is	of	use	to	people,	remains	in	the	earth;	this	is	how	Allah illustrates	the	examples.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Us	 ne	 āsmān	 se	 pāni	 utārā	 to	 nāle	 apne	
apne	lāiq	bah	nikle	to	pāni	ki	rau	(dhār)	us	
par	ubhre	 huye	jhāg	 uthā	lāyi	 aur	jis	 par	
āag	 dahkāte	 haiñ	 gahnā	 (zewar)	 yā	 aur	
asbāb	 banāne	 ko	 us	 se	 bhi	 waise	 hi	 jhāg	
uthte	haiñ	Allāh	batātā	hai	ke	haq	aur	bațil	
ki	yahi	misāl	hai	to	jhāg	to	phuk	kar	door	ho	jātā	hai	aur	woh	jo	logoñ	ke	kām	āaye		zameen meiñ	
rahtā		hai	Allāh	yooñ	hi	misāleñ	bayān	farmātā	hai

arabicText: لِلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَجَابُوا۟ لِرَبِّهِمُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَمْ يَسْتَجِيبُوا۟ لَهُۥ لَوْ أَنَّ لَهُم مَّا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًۭا وَمِثْلَهُۥ مَعَهُۥ لَٱفْتَدَوْا۟ بِهِۦٓ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ سُوٓءُ ٱلْحِسَابِ وَمَأْوَىٰهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمِهَادُ
englishTranslationText:
For	 those	who	 obeyed	 the	command	 of	Allah is	goodness	and if	 those	who	did	not	 obey	Him	
owned	all	that	is	in	the	earth	and	in	addition	a	similar	one	like	it,	they	would	give	it	to	redeem	
their	souls;	it	is	they	who	will	have	a	wretched	account,	and	their	destination	is	hell;	and	what	a	
wretched	resting	place!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jin	logoñ	ne	apne	Rab	kā	hukm	mānā	unhiñ	ke	liye	bhalāi	hai	aur	jinhoñ	ne	us	kā	hukm	na	mānā	
agar	zameen meiñ	jo	kuchh		hai	woh	sab	aur	is	jaisā		aur	un	ki	milk	meiñ	hotā	to	apni	jān	chudāne
ko	 de	 dete	 yahi	 haiñ	jin	 kā	 burā	 hisāb	 hogā	aur	 un	 kā	 thikāna	jahannam	 hai	aur	 kyā	 hi	 burā	
bichaunā

arabicText: ۞ أَفَمَن يَعْلَمُ أَنَّمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ ٱلْحَقُّ كَمَنْ هُوَ أَعْمَىٰٓ ۚ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
englishTranslationText:
So	 will	 he,	 who	 knows	 that	 what	 is	 sent	
down	 upon	 you	 from	 your	 Lord	 is	 the	
truth,	ever	be	equal	 to	him	who	is	blind?	
Only	 the	 men	 of	 understanding	 heed	
advice.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kyā	woh	jo	jāntā	hai	jo	kuchh	tumhāri	
țaraf	 tumhāre	 rab	 ke	 pās se	 utrā	 haq	 hai	
woh	 us	 jaisā	 hogā	 jo	 andhā	 hai	 nasihat	
wohi		mānte	haiñ	jinheiñ áql	hai

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يُوفُونَ بِعَهْدِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا يَنقُضُونَ ٱلْمِيثَـٰقَ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	 fulfil	 the	pact	of	Allah,	and	do	
not	renege	on	the	covenant.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	Allāh	kā áhad	poorā	karte	haiñ	aur	
qaul	bāndh	kar	(w’adā	karke)	phirte	nahiñ.

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَصِلُونَ مَآ أَمَرَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦٓ أَن يُوصَلَ وَيَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُمْ وَيَخَافُونَ سُوٓءَ ٱلْحِسَابِ
englishTranslationText:
Those	 who	 unite	 what	 Allah has	
commanded	 to	 be	 united,	 and	 who	 fear	
their	 Lord,	 and	 dread	 the	 evil	 of	 the	
account.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	ke	jodte	haiñ	usey	jis	ke	Jodne	kā	
Allāh	ne	hukm	diyā	aur	apne	Rab	se	darte	
aur	hisāb	ki	burāi	se	andesha	rakhte	haiñ

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُوا۟ ٱبْتِغَآءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأَنفَقُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ سِرًّۭا وَعَلَانِيَةًۭ وَيَدْرَءُونَ بِٱلْحَسَنَةِ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ عُقْبَى ٱلدَّارِ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	were	 patient	in	 order	 to	 gain	
their	Lord’s	pleasure	and	kept	 the	prayer	
established	and	spent	in	Our	cause	part	of	
what	 We	 bestowed	 upon	 them,	 secretly	
and	openly,	and	 repel	evil	 by	 responding	
with	goodness	- for	them	is	the	gain	of	the	
final	abode.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jinhoñ	sabr	kiyā	apne	Rab	ki	rizā	
chāhne	 ko	 aur	 Namāz	 qāim	 rakhi	 aur	
hamāre	diye	se	hamāri	rāh	meiñ	chupe	aur	
zahir	 kuchh	 	 kharch	 kiyā	 aur	 burāyi	 ke	
badle	bhalāi	karke	tālte	haiñ	unhiñ	ke	liye	
pichle	ghar	kā	naf’a	hai.

arabicText: جَنَّـٰتُ عَدْنٍۢ يَدْخُلُونَهَا وَمَن صَلَحَ مِنْ ءَابَآئِهِمْ وَأَزْوَٰجِهِمْ وَذُرِّيَّـٰتِهِمْ ۖ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ يَدْخُلُونَ عَلَيْهِم مِّن كُلِّ بَابٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
The	 everlasting	 Gardens	 of	 Eden	 which	
they	will	enter,	and	 the	deserving	among	
their	forefathers	and	their	wives	and	their	
descendants	- the	 angels	 will	 enter	 upon	
them	from	every	gate.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Basne	ke	bāgh	jin	meiñ	woh	dākhil	hoñ	ge	
aur	jo	lāiq	hoñ	un	ke	bāp	dādā	aur	bibiyoñ	
aur	aulād	meiñ	aur	firishte	har	darwāze	se	
un	par	yeh	kahte		āayeñ		ge

arabicText: سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكُم بِمَا صَبَرْتُمْ ۚ فَنِعْمَ عُقْبَى ٱلدَّارِ
englishTranslationText:
(Saying),	 “Peace	 be	 upon	 you,	 the	
recompense	of	your	patience	- so	what	an	
excellent	gain	is	the	final	abode!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Salāmati	ho	tum	par	tumhāre	sabr	kā	badlā	
to	pichlā	ghar	kyā	hi	khoob	milā.

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَنقُضُونَ عَهْدَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مِيثَـٰقِهِۦ وَيَقْطَعُونَ مَآ أَمَرَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦٓ أَن يُوصَلَ وَيُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۙ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱللَّعْنَةُ وَلَهُمْ سُوٓءُ ٱلدَّارِ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	break	the	pact	of	Allah after	its	ratification,	and	sever	what	Allah has	commanded	
to	be	joined,	and	spread	turmoil	in	the	earth	- their	share	is	only	the	curse	and	their	destiny	is	
the	wretched	abode.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jo	Allāh	kā áhed	us	ke	pakke	hone	ke	b’ad	tordte	aur	jis	ke	jordne	ko	Allāh	ne	farmāyā	
usey	qat’a	karte	aur	zameen	meiñ	fasād	phailāte	haiñ	un	kā	hissā	lá’ānat	hi	hai	aur	un	kā	naseeba	
burā	ghar

arabicText: ٱللَّهُ يَبْسُطُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقْدِرُ ۚ وَفَرِحُوا۟ بِٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَمَا ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ إِلَّا مَتَـٰعٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Allah eases	and	restricts	 the	sustenance	 for	whomever	He	wills;	and	 the	disbelievers	rejoiced	
upon	the	life	of	this	world;	and	the	life	of	this	world,	as	compared	with	the	Hereafter,	is	just	a	
brief	utilisation.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allāh	jis	ke	liye	chāhe	rizq	kushāda	aur	tang	kartā	hai	aur kāfir	dunyā	ki	zindagi	par	itrā	gaye	aur	
dunyā	ki	zindagi	āakhirat		ke	muqābil	nahiñ	magar	kuchh		din	barat	lenā

arabicText: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَةٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُضِلُّ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهْدِىٓ إِلَيْهِ مَنْ أَنَابَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	disbelievers	said,	“Why	was	not	a	sign	sent	down	upon	him	from	his	Lord?”	Proclaim,	
“Indeed	Allah sends	astray	whomever	He	wills,	and	guides	towards	Himself	the	one	who	comes	
towards	Him.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kāfir	kahte	in	par	koi	nishāni	in	ke	Rab	ki	țaraf	se	kiyuñ	na	utri	tum	farmāo	be-shak		Allāh	
jise	chāhe	gumrāh	kartā	hai	aur	Apni	rāh	usey detā	hai	jo	us	ki	țaraf	ruju’	lāye

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَطْمَئِنُّ قُلُوبُهُم بِذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ أَلَا بِذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ تَطْمَئِنُّ ٱلْقُلُوبُ
englishTranslationText:
“Those	who	accepted	 faith	and	whose	hearts	gain	solace	 from	 the	remembrance	of	Allah;	pay	
heed!	Only	in	the	remembrance	of	Allah is	the	solace	of	hearts!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
“Woh	jo	Imān lāye	aur	un	ke	dil	Allāh	ki	yād	se	chain	pāte	haiñ; Sun	lo! Allāh	ki	yād	hi	meiñ	diloñ	
kā	chain	hai!”

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ طُوبَىٰ لَهُمْ وَحُسْنُ مَـَٔابٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
“Those	 who	 accepted	 faith	 and	 did	 good	
deeds	 - for	 them	 is	 joy	 and	 an	 excellent	
outcome.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	Imān	laye	aur	achchhe	kām	kiye	un	
ko	khushi	hai	aur	achchā	anjām

arabicText: كَذَٰلِكَ أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ فِىٓ أُمَّةٍۢ قَدْ خَلَتْ مِن قَبْلِهَآ أُمَمٌۭ لِّتَتْلُوَا۟ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْكَ وَهُمْ يَكْفُرُونَ بِٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۚ قُلْ هُوَ رَبِّى لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَإِلَيْهِ مَتَابِ
englishTranslationText:
Similarly	 We	 sent	 you	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	
Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him)	 towards	 the	 nation,	 before	 whom	
other	nations	have	passed	away,	for	you	to	
recite	 to	 them	 the	 divine	 revelations	 We	
sent	 down	 to	 you,	 whereas	 they	 are	
denying	 the	Most	Gracious;	proclaim,	“He	
is	my	Lord	- there	is	no	worship	except	for	
Him;	 I	 rely	 only	 upon	 Him	 and	 only	
towards	Him	is	my	return.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Isi	ṭarah	 ham	 ne	 tum	 ko	 is	Ummat	 meiñ	
bhejā, jis	se	pahle	Ummateñ	ho	guzriñ, ke	
tum	 unheñ	 padh	 kar	 sunāo	 jo	 ham	 ne	
tumhāri	țaraf		waḥi	ki	aur	woh	rahmān	ke	
munkir	 ho	 rahe	 haiñ	 tum	 farmāo	 woh	
merā	 Rab	 hai	 us	 ke	 siwā	 kisi	 ki	 bandagi	
nahiñ	maiñ	ne	usi	par	bharosa	kiyā	aur	usi	
ki	țaraf	meri	ruju’	hai

arabicText: وَلَوْ أَنَّ قُرْءَانًۭا سُيِّرَتْ بِهِ ٱلْجِبَالُ أَوْ قُطِّعَتْ بِهِ ٱلْأَرْضُ أَوْ كُلِّمَ بِهِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ ۗ بَل لِّلَّهِ ٱلْأَمْرُ جَمِيعًا ۗ أَفَلَمْ يَا۟يْـَٔسِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَن لَّوْ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ لَهَدَى ٱلنَّاسَ جَمِيعًۭا ۗ وَلَا يَزَالُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ تُصِيبُهُم بِمَا صَنَعُوا۟ قَارِعَةٌ أَوْ تَحُلُّ قَرِيبًۭا مِّن دَارِهِمْ حَتَّىٰ يَأْتِىَ وَعْدُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُخْلِفُ ٱلْمِيعَادَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 were	 such	 a	 Qur’an	 to	 come	 that	
would	cause	the	mountains	to	move,	or	the	
earth	to	split	asunder,	or	the	dead	to	speak,	
even	 then	 these	 disbelievers	 would	 not	
believe;	 in	 fact,	 all	 matters	 are	 only	 at	
Allah’s	discretion;	so	have	not	the	Muslims	
despaired	 in	 that,	 had	 Allah willed,	 He	
would	have	guided	all	mankind?	Disasters	
shall	continue	to	strike	the	disbelievers	on	
account	 of	 their	 deeds,	 or	 descend	 near	
their	 homes	 until	Allah’s	 promise	 comes;	
indeed	Allah does	not	break	the	promise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	koi	aisā	Qur'ān	ātā	jis	se	pahād	tal	
jāte	 yā	 zameen	 phat	 jāti	 yā	 murde	 bāteñ	
karte	jab	bhi	yeh	kāfir	na	mānte	balke	sab	
kām	Allāh	hi	ke	ikhtiyār	meiñ	haiñ	to	kyā	
musalmān	is	se	nā	ummid	na	huye	ke	Allāh	
chāhtā	 to	 sab	 āadmiyoñ	 ko	 hidāyat	 kar	
detā	aur	kāfiroñ	ko	hameshā	un	ke	kiye	par	
sakht	 dhamak	 (Intihāyi	 sakht	 museebat)	
pahuñchti	 rahegi	 yā	 un	 ke	 gharoñ	 ke	
nazdik	utregi	yahāñ	tak	ke	Allāh	kā	w’adā	
āaye	 be-shak	 Allāh	 w’adā	 khilāf	 nahiñ	
kartā

arabicText: وَلَقَدِ ٱسْتُهْزِئَ بِرُسُلٍۢ مِّن قَبْلِكَ فَأَمْلَيْتُ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ثُمَّ أَخَذْتُهُمْ ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عِقَابِ
englishTranslationText:
And	indeed	 the	Noble	Messengers	 before	
you	 were	 also	 mocked	- I	 therefore	 gave	
the	mockers	respite	for	some	days	and	then	seized	them;	so	how	(dreadful)	was	My	punishment!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be-shak		tum	se	agle	Rasooloñ	par	bhi	
hañsi	ki	gayi		to	maiñ	ne	kāfiroñ	ko	kuchh		dinoñ	dhil	di	phir	unheñ	pakdā	to	merā áƶāb	kaisā	thā?

arabicText: أَفَمَنْ هُوَ قَآئِمٌ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ ۗ وَجَعَلُوا۟ لِلَّهِ شُرَكَآءَ قُلْ سَمُّوهُمْ ۚ أَمْ تُنَبِّـُٔونَهُۥ بِمَا لَا يَعْلَمُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَم بِظَـٰهِرٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ ۗ بَلْ زُيِّنَ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مَكْرُهُمْ وَصُدُّوا۟ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ ۗ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
So	is	He	who	keeps	a	watch	over	the	deeds	of	every	soul	(equal	to	their	appointed	partners)?	And	
(yet)	they	ascribe	partners	to	Allah!	Proclaim,	“Just	name	them	- or	is	it	that	you	inform	Him	of	
something	which	in	His	knowledge	does	not	exist	in	the	earth	- or	is	it	just	superficial	talk?”	In	
fact,	their	deceit	seems	good	to	the	disbelievers	and	are	prevented	from	the	path;	and	whomever	
Allah sends	astray,	so	there	is	none	to	guide	him.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kyā	woh	jo	har	jān	par	us	ke	a’amāl	ki	nigehdāsht	rakhtā	hai	aur	woh	Allāh	ke	sharik	thahrāte	
haiñ	tum	farmāo	un	kā	nām	to	lo	yā	usey		woh	batāte	ho	jo	us	ke	ìlm	meiñ	sari	zameen			meiñ	
nahiñ	yā	yooñ	hi	ūpari	(Be	M’anā)	bāt	balke	kāfiroñ	ki	nigāh	meiñ	un	kā	fareb	achchā	ahrā	hai	
aur	rāh	se	roke	gaye	aur	jise	Allāh	gumrāh	kare	usey		koi	hidāyat	karne	wālā	nahiñ

arabicText: لَّهُمْ عَذَابٌۭ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَشَقُّ ۖ وَمَا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَاقٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
They	will	be	punished	in	the	life	of	this	world,	and	indeed	the	punishment	of	the	Hereafter	is	the	
most	severe;	and	there	is none	to	save	them	from	Allah.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unheñ	dunyā	ke	jite áƶāb	hogā	aur	be-shak		āakhirat		kā áƶāb	sab	se	sakht	hai	aur	unheñ	Allāh	se	
bachāne	wālā	koi	nahiñ

arabicText: ۞ مَّثَلُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلَّتِى وُعِدَ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ ۖ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۖ أُكُلُهَا دَآئِمٌۭ وَظِلُّهَا ۚ تِلْكَ عُقْبَى ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوا۟ ۖ وَّعُقْبَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ ٱلنَّارُ
englishTranslationText:
A	 description	 of	 the	 Paradise	 which	 is	
promised	to	the	pious;	rivers	flow	beneath	
it;	 its	 fruits	 are	 unending,	 and	 its	 shade;	
this	is	 the	 reward	 of	 those	who	 fear;	and	
the	fate	of	the	disbelievers	is	fire.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ahwāl	us	Jannat	kā	ke	dar	wāloñ	ke	liye	jis	
kā	w’adā	hai	us	ke	niche	nehreñ	bahti	haiñ	
us	 ke	mewe	 hameshā	 aur	 us	 kā	 sāya	 dar	
wāloñ	kā	to	yeh	anjām	hai	aur	kāfiroñ	kā	
anjām	āag

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ يَفْرَحُونَ بِمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ ۖ وَمِنَ ٱلْأَحْزَابِ مَن يُنكِرُ بَعْضَهُۥ ۚ قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ ٱللَّهَ وَلَآ أُشْرِكَ بِهِۦٓ ۚ إِلَيْهِ أَدْعُوا۟ وَإِلَيْهِ مَـَٔابِ
englishTranslationText:
And	 those	 to	 whom	 We	 gave	 the	 Book	 *	
rejoice	at	what	is	divinely	revealed	to	you	
**;	and	of	those	groups	are	some	who	deny	
parts	 of	 it;	 proclaim,	 “I	 am	 commanded	
only	 that	 I	worship	Allah and	not	ascribe	
any	partner	to	Him;	towards	Him	do	I	call,	
and	towards	Him	only	I	have	to	return.”	(*	
Scholars	 among	 the	 Jews	 and	 Christians	
who	accepted	faith.	**	The	Holy	Qur’an.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jin	 ko	 Ham	 ne	 Kitāb	 di	 woh	 us	 par	
khush	 hote	 jo	 tumhāri	 țaraf	 utrā	 aur	 un	
girohoñ	meiñ	kuchh	woh	haiñ	ke	is	ke	b’az	
se	munkir	haiñ	tum	farmāo	mujhe	to	yahi	
hukm	hai	 ke	Allāh	 ki	bandagi	 karooñ	aur	
us	kā	sharik	na	thahrāooñ	maiñ	usi	ki	țaraf		
bulātā	hooñ	aur	usi	ki	țaraf	mujhe	phirnā

arabicText: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ حُكْمًا عَرَبِيًّۭا ۚ وَلَئِنِ ٱتَّبَعْتَ أَهْوَآءَهُم بَعْدَ مَا جَآءَكَ مِنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ مَا لَكَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِىٍّۢ وَلَا وَاقٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	 similarly	We	 have	 revealed	 this	as	a	
command	 in	 Arabic;	 and	 O	 listener	
(follower	 of	 this	 Prophet),	 if	 you	 follow	
their	 desires	 after	 the	 knowledge	 having	
come	to	you,	then	you	will	have	neither	a	
supporter	nor	any	saviour	against	Allah.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	isi	țarah	ham	ne	usey	 árbi	faislā	utārā	
aur	 aey	 sunne	 wāle! Agar	 tu	 un	 ki	
khwāhishoñ	par	chalegā	b’ad	is	ke	ke	tujhe	
ìlm	āa	chukā	 to	Allāh	ke	āage	na	 terā	koi	
himāyati	hogā	na	bachāne	wālā

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلًۭا مِّن قَبْلِكَ وَجَعَلْنَا لَهُمْ أَزْوَٰجًۭا وَذُرِّيَّةًۭ ۚ وَمَا كَانَ لِرَسُولٍ أَن يَأْتِىَ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ لِكُلِّ أَجَلٍۢ كِتَابٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 indeed	 We	 sent	 Noble	 Messengers	
before	you,	and	made	wives	and	children	
for	them;	and	it	is	not	the	task	of	any	Noble	
Messenger	to	bring	a	sign	except	by	Allah’s	
command;	 and	 all	 promises	 have	 a	 time	
prescribed.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be-shak		Ham	ne	tum	se	pahle	Rasool
bheje	aur	 un	 ke	liye	 bibiyāñ	aur	 bachche	
kiye	aur	 kisi	Rasool kā	 kām	 nahiñ	 ke	 koi	
nishāni	le	āaye	magar	Allāh	ke	hukm	se	har	
wáde	ki	ek	likhat	(Tahreer)	hai

arabicText: يَمْحُوا۟ ٱللَّهُ مَا يَشَآءُ وَيُثْبِتُ ۖ وَعِندَهُۥٓ أُمُّ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ
englishTranslationText:
Allah erases	 and	 confirms	 whatever	 He	
wills;	and	only	with	Him	is	the	real	script.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allāh	 jo	 chāhe	 mitātā	 aur	 sābit	 kartā	 hai	
aur	asl	likhā	huwā	usi	ke	pās	hai

arabicText: وَإِن مَّا نُرِيَنَّكَ بَعْضَ ٱلَّذِى نَعِدُهُمْ أَوْ نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ وَعَلَيْنَا ٱلْحِسَابُ
englishTranslationText:
And	whether	We	show	you	a	promise	that	is	given	to	them,	or	call	you	to	Us	before	it	- so	in	any	
case,	upon	you	is	just	the	conveyance	*,	and	for	Us	is	the	taking	of	the	account.	(*	Of	the	message.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	hamiñ	tumheñ	dikhā	deñ	koi	w’adā	jo	unheñ	diyā	jātā	hai	yā	pahle		hi	apne	pās	bulā	leñ	
to	har	hāl	meiñ	tum	par	to	sirf	pahuñchānā	hai	aur	hisāb	lenā	hamārā	zimma

arabicText: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا نَأْتِى ٱلْأَرْضَ نَنقُصُهَا مِنْ أَطْرَافِهَا ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَحْكُمُ لَا مُعَقِّبَ لِحُكْمِهِۦ ۚ وَهُوَ سَرِيعُ ٱلْحِسَابِ
englishTranslationText:
Do	they	not	perceive	that	We	are	reducing	their	dwellings	from	all	directions?	And	Allah gives	
the	command	- there	is	none	that	can	postpone	His	command;	and	He	spends	no	time	in	taking	
account.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kyā	unheñ	nahiñ	sujhtā	ke	ham	har	țaraf	se	un	ki	āabādi	ghatāte	āa	rahe	haiñ	aur	Allāh	hukm	
farmātā	hai	us	kā	hukm	piche	dālne	wālā	koi	nahiñ	aur	usey	hisāb	lete	der	nahiñ	lagti.

arabicText: وَقَدْ مَكَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَلِلَّهِ ٱلْمَكْرُ جَمِيعًۭا ۖ يَعْلَمُ مَا تَكْسِبُ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ ۗ وَسَيَعْلَمُ ٱلْكُفَّـٰرُ لِمَنْ عُقْبَى ٱلدَّارِ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	se	agle	 fareb	kar	chuke	haiñ	 to	sāri	khufyā	 tadbir	kā	Mālik	 to	Allāh	hi	hai	jāntā	hai	jo	
kuchh		koi	jān	kamāye	aur	ab	jānnā	chāhte	haiñ	kāfir	kise	miltā	hai	pichlā	ghar

arabicText: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَسْتَ مُرْسَلًۭا ۚ قُلْ كَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدًۢا بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَكُمْ وَمَنْ عِندَهُۥ عِلْمُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ
englishTranslationText:
The	 disbelievers	 say,	 “You	 are	 not	 a	
(Noble)	 Messenger	 (of	 Allah)”;	 proclaim,	
“Allah is	a	Sufficient	Witness	between	me	
and	you,	and	(so	is)	he	who	has	knowledge	
of	the	Book.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kāfir	kahte		haiñ	tum	Rasool nahiñ	tum	
farmāo	Allāh	gawāh	kāfi	hai	mujh	meiñ	aur	
tum	meiñ	aur	woh	jise	kitāb	kā	Ílm	hai
